abstract.t: This document defines a new architecture on the client-side for authentication by EAP. This architecture complements the usual setup considered in EAP by making it become symmetric: the client-side is divided in two parts, the Authentication Token and the client, which are analogous respectively to the Authentication Server and the Authenticator on the server-side. Moreover, this document describes a framework for the use of Authentication Tokens with the EAP protocol.
